message: I have the design, portion of the platform and customers waiting. Need a dev to finish beta platform for equity/ cofounder.
Gotta love posts like this. Vague, no mention of payment despite the HUGE $$$, and equity in this mysterious venture.
@gtaylor I was thinking about the exact same thing… Almost sounds like the Nigeria prince/minister/whatever: "HUGE $$$! All you have to do is…" :p
I remember there was a HN post where you should try to implement it yourself instead of asking others.... also this is way to vague.

@zitterbewegung Vague is the exact problem. Of course that title doesn't help… Also, something along the lines of "I started working an idea but need help developing it. I'd love to turn this into a profitable project and if you're interested, I'd be happy to have you cofound it (with equity) with me" would probably generate more interest from actual talent. Developers (the actual ones) are constantly hammered by recruiters and if you take the same approach you scare every good developer away…
